Portsmouth Cycle Forum

Portsmouth Cycle Forum is a group for anyone who cycles, or wants to cycle, in and around Portsmouth UK.

January Newsletter from Portsmouth Cycle Forum

Monday 10 January 2011
1 min

caption="Bike "blinging" at Eastney Xhristmas Bike Party"]

Happy New year from Portsmouth Cycle Forum! We hope you have enjoyed the festive season and that you're looking forward to and exciting year ahead. We've another bumper issue in our monthly newsletter where we hope to keep you informed of what's been going on and what is planned. Read it here.

A downloadable PDF version is also available here.
